title: Ep94: Butte de Warlencourt
itunes:title: Ep94: Butte de Warlencourt
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary tell the story of the savage fighting around the Butte de Warlencourt in the Somme in November 1916. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or...
description:
Pete and Gary tell the story of the savage fighting around the Butte de Warlencourt in the Somme in November 1916.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
